item.description:
OK, you asked for it, you got it! Let's see if we can get a good "regular" group meeting going. We will have this first meet-up at The Scarlet Oak Tavern, 1217 Main Street, Hingham, MA - Ph (781) 749-8200. This will be very casual, I'll be in the Bar area by 6pm. If you have trouble finding me, call my cell phone 847-361-8851. Bring your business cards and let's get to know each other and have some fun.

Directions:

From Boston: Take Route 93 South to Route 3 South. Take Exit 15 towards Derby St./S. Hingham/S. Weymouth. Go right off of the exit towards Route 53 and follow the road for 1.7 miles. Take a left at the light onto Main Street/228, and the Scarlet Oak Tavern will be on your immediate left.

From the South: Take Route 3 North to Exit 14 for Rockland/Nantasket. Merge onto Route 228 towards Hingham/Nantasket. Follow this road for 0.5 miles to the intersection of Rt. 53 (it will be the first traffic light). Go through the intersection, and The Scarlet Oak Tavern will be immediately on your left.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a bright green v-neck short sleeve shirt on!

group.name: South Shore Graphic Designers, Writers & Web Folks

item.name: Scarlet Oak Tavern
